title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations         2014 George Rogers Clark Day celebration inside the Clark Memorial rotunda.   School group visits are a great way to build on lessons learned in the classroom. For more information about what a school visit involves, click here. All group visits are scheduled through the Vincennes/Knox County Convention and Visitor Bureau (CVB). The CVB may be contacted by calling 1-800-886-6443 or by visiting their website. Weddings and other special park uses require a special use permit. The permit must be obtained through the park Superintendent prior to the actual event. Please begin the process of obtaining a permitno later than three months prior to the event. (information about special use permits)
